definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: When you look at the books, you see he is just one of a hundred students or whatever.
sentences.chinese: 你看看账本就会明白他只是众多富家子弟中的一员。

sentences.english: If you’ve never tracked your expenses, try the One Month Challenge.
sentences.chinese: 如果你从不记账，可以先尝试“一个月账本”。

sentences.english: Learn how green data centers can add more to your bottom line.
sentences.chinese: 学习绿色数据中心怎样促进降低你的账本底线。

sentences.english: Fixed to the chain were keys, bank-books , money-boxes, and other heavy things.
sentences.chinese: 在锁链上绑着钥匙，账本，钱箱，还有其他贵重物品。

sentences.english: A small hotel usually employs an outside accountant to check its books periodically.
sentences.chinese: 小酒店通常聘一位外面的会计师定期核对账本。

sentences.english: Cloud hair stolen books to the supervision office.
sentences.chinese: 程云发将偷来的账本交给了监督室。

definition: to keep accounts/bookkeeping/to charge to an account
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
